135.title: Battle march

14.content: The Two soul swords; Soul calibur and Soul edge are powerful weapons. do we follow their paths, or should we follow another story?
14.title: The soul swords

141.content:
It was quiet.
Too quiet.
Too quiet for mordor.
unsheathing the crystal sword known as Soul Calibur, Siegfried looked around, his ice-like armour gleaming in the sun. looking around the battleground, the only thing that the human saw was the skeletons of nine dragon-like creatures. a hooded figure sttod amung the skeletons.
walking over to the figure, Soul Calibur still drawn. Siegfried tried to find out what happened.
"How did this happen" the warrior asked.
"A demon attacked" the figure rasped, "The fellbeasts were destroyed by a weapon with an eye in the hilt.
"soul edge" siegfried wispered to himself. the black figure whistled and a black horse rode up to him, the figure mounted and rode back to the black gate.
as the black figure rode away, five words followed it from siegfried "Nightmare must have been here"
141.title: mordor's gate

choices: Nightmare travels to the warhammer world
Nightmare travels back to the tower of lost souls (Through each land)
142.content:
All was quiet at the black gate.
All that was standing on the field was a lone figure, clad in armour from head to foot. the clawed hands of this demonic figure flexed as the gate opened. one hand reached to its back and drew a large red sword. an eye on the hilt blinked once before orcs, haradrim, soldiers of rhun, mumakil and trolls poured out of the gate.
these evil beasts charged at the being, swords, halberds and clubs set to strike. the figure raised its sword and sliced it downwards, splitting the skull of one orc completely in half. twisting the sword, it swung the sword again, spinning in a complete circle and taking out a number of orcs in the progress. the ancient sword hacked through armour, flesh and bone on its rampage. not even the trolls and mumakil, with their great size and strength, could survive the onsaught.
as the demonic being continued to eradicate the army, the fellbeasts, their Nazgul riders poised to strike, swooped down on the figure.
the sword, now stained with blood, slashed at the air, destroying two fellbeasts with two slashes.
one Nazgul lowered his hood, revealing himself as the witch king of angmar.
"Battle all you wish" the witch king, "No man can destroy me"
"I AM NO MAN" the figure boomed, "I AM NIGHTMARE, DEMON OF THE SOUL EDGE" at those words, Nightmare slashed soul edge, throwing the witch king into one of the gates.
As the sun set behind the mountains, hundreds of corpses of the great army littered the battlefield. Nightmare looked around at the field before resheathing soul edge on his back before walking away from mordor. the gates were destroyed, the armies of mordor and harad destroyed and the ground stained with blood.
"This "Nightmare" shows promise" was the reaction of the eye of sauron as it watched the demonic Nightmare with great intrest.
142.title: Nightmare at mordors' gates

*Please only add a chapter if you have the guide book, or own a copy of Final Fantasy 13.

The following are as follows: L'Cie & their Eidolons(Lightning - Odin, Fang - Buhamut, Hope - Alexander, Snow - Shive [Stiria & Nix], Vanille - Hecatoncheir, Sazh - Brynhildr)

Cie'th (Ghouls, Ghasts, Strigois, Taxims, Vampires, Sacrifices, Wights, Pijavicas, Nelapsies, Varcolacies, Edimmu***, Chonchon, Penanggalan, Vetala, Raktavija***, Seekers, Mithridates***, Bituitus***, Geiseric***, Syphax***, Numidia, Attacus***, Wladislaus, Vercinigetorix***)

Soldiers (PSICOM Enforcers, PSICOM Trackers, PSICOM Scavengers, PSICOM Raiders, Sanctum Seraphs, Targeting Beacons, PSICOM Wardens, PSICOM Rangers, PSICOM Predators, PSICOM Infiltrators, Sanctum Archangels, PSICOM Bombardiers, PSICOM Destroyer, Sanctum Celebrant, PSICOM Aerial Recon, PSICOM Aerial Sniper, PSICOM Dragoon, PSICOM Huntress, Sanctum Inquisitrix, PSICOM Marauders****, PSICOM Executioners****, PSICOM Warlords****, PSICOM Reaver****, Sanctum Templars****, Corps Regulars, Corps Watchmen, Corps Pacifexes, Corps Stewards, Corps Gunners, Corps Marksmen, Corps Tranquifexes, Corps Defenders, Watchdrones, Deckdrones, Myrmidons, Crusaders, Orions, Vikings, Uhlans, Bulwarker, Ciconia Velocycles, Falco Velocycles, Milvus Velocycles, Aquila Velocycles, Midlight Reapers, Megrim Threshers, Havoc Skytanks, Pantherons, Thexterons, Adamantherons, Zwerg Scandroids, Zwerg Metrodroids, Vespids, Vespid Soldiers, Frag Leeches, Lucidons, Thermadons, Flanitors, Flanborgs, Beta Behemoths, Alpha Behemoths, Lodestar Behemoths, Proto-Behemoths, Manasvin Warmechs, Anavapta Warmechs, Garuda Interceptors, Kalavinka Strikers, Aster Protoflorians, Vernal Harvesters, Ushumugal Subjugators, Tiamat Eliminators, The Proudclad***)

info.brief_description: Join forces with different video games for the ultimate war
info.description:
The video game worlds are clashing!
characters and armies from different video games are readying for war!
and the war of the game worlds are about to begin!
what will be the outcome of the war?
only time will tell.

all you have to do is choose what game to follow and create the path for it.

obviously add some killing. I mean it IS a war.

so, with that said. enjoy, and be sure to add some chapters to it.
